message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the larger share, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm not afraid of a little competition. Let's see what you've got!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than that. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, but I'm not budging yet!
We're both losing money with each round. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
I'm not ready to give up yet. You're not getting the better deal!
We're both getting less and less with every round.  It's time to compromise. This is my final offer.

We're both losing out on a lot of money.  This is my final offer.  If you reject it, we both get nothing.
